TopicTitle: KSP Career Mode: Trying to KSP. (NEW!)

Articles.Content:
After recently landing on the Mun, I decided to try out Career mode. :P

SETTINGS
General Options: All Easy Mode Defaults.
Starting Funds: 500000
Starting Science: 30
Starting Reputation: 150
All Rewards: 300%
All Penalties: 10%

*Instantly tries to get to Science Area"
*Gets Basic Rocketry and Engineering 101

Let's do SCIENCE! on the launchpad.. if that works.
*Collects 2 Mystery Goo samples and 1 Science JR. sample. Also gets an EVA report and Crew Report
*Notices bunker
Gonna have to see that later.
*Recovers Vessel
*72 SCIENCE!
*Gets all Tier 3 Upgrades
Jesus, this is going better than I thought..
*Goes to Administration Building
Oooh... Interesting.
[10 MINUTES LATER]
Nah. Not now.
*BUILDS ROCKET
*ROCKET IS TOO LARGE
*MAKES ROCKET SMALLER
Alright.. Sucessful launch.
Wait... aren't there CONTRACTS?
REVERT
I CAN UPGRADE STUFF I HAVE THE MONEY!! (UPGRADE SPREE)
Alright,
My Launch Pad, VAB, Runway, SPH, Tracking Station, Astronaut Complex are fully upgraded. the rest is Level 2.
LAUNCH TIME!!
Launch First Vessel Contract Completed.
Reach 150 M/S
Reach 300 M/S
Reach 450 M/S
600 M/S
750 M/S and at the same time 7500 M
AH! SRB Stage over. Detach.
AAAND THE SHIP! THE SHIP! ITS FALLIN OVER!
Ship is now stable...
Check the map view
1050 M/S!!
WOAH! CUT ENGINES! ADD MANEUVER!
Fuel ran out. Detach.
WHOA WHOA WOAH WOAH WOAH I GOT A MUN ENCOUNTER HOLY **** NOT NOW I JUST STARTED HOLY MOTHER OF GOD OMG OMG OMG OMG GO GO GO GO GO GO GO GO GO GO GO GO GO GO!!!!! :D :D :DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD
Ah. Fuel out.... :P
OH GOD I LOST THE SHIP WHILE COLLECTING DATA >:(
Revert flight >:(

Actually... Let's get to the Mun!

*A little modifying later

>:D LETS GOOOOOO
Can't afford.

Ah well. It's thunderstorming out here and I don't want power to cut out and I lose progress. Bye.
